md:
giải nghĩa từ "adjustments" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Adjustments: /əˈdʒʌst.mənts/ (noun)
	+ Meaning: Changes made to something to improve it or make it more suitable.
	+ Example: The company made some adjustments to the product design to make it more appealing to customers.
	+ Related words: modify, alter, revise, tweak, fine-tune.

* Adjustments: /əˈdʒʌst.mənts/ (noun)
	+ Meaning: Changes made to a financial account or a budget to reflect new information or circumstances.
	+ Example: The accountant made some adjustments to the company's budget to reflect the changes in the market.
	+ Related words: corrections, revisions, alterations, modifications.

* Adjustments: /əˈdʌst.mənts/ (noun)
	+ Meaning: Changes made to a person's behavior or attitude to adapt to a new situation.
	+ Example: She made some adjustments to her lifestyle after moving to a new city.
	+ Related words: adaptations, changes, modifications, shifts.

Vietnamese translation: điều chỉnh, thay đổi, sửa đổi.

Note: The meaning of "adjustments" can vary depending on the context in which it is used. The above definitions and examples are just a few possible interpretations of the word.
html:
giải nghĩa từ "adjustments" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Adjustments: /əˈdʒʌst.mənts/ (noun)

    • Meaning: Changes made to something to improve it or make it more suitable.

    • Related words: modify, alter, revise, tweak, fine-tune.

  • Adjustments: /əˈdʒʌst.mənts/ (noun)

    • Meaning: Changes made to a financial account or a budget to reflect new information or circumstances.
    • Example: The accountant made some adjustments to the company's budget to reflect the changes in the market.
    • Related words: corrections, revisions, alterations, modifications.

  • Adjustments: /əˈdʌst.mənts/ (noun)

    • Meaning: Changes made to a person's behavior or attitude to adapt to a new situation.
    • Example: She made some adjustments to her lifestyle after moving to a new city.
    • Related words: adaptations, changes, modifications, shifts.

Vietnamese translation: điều chỉnh, thay đổi, sửa đổi.

Note: The meaning of "adjustments" can vary depending on the context in which it is used. The above definitions and examples are just a few possible interpretations of the word.
